Class Island

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Island
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class Island extends Object implements Serializable
This class represent an Island.

    changeTower(ColorTower tower)
    Method to change the tower(s) on the island(s), if tower is null it means that there were no towers at all on the island and so we set numTowers to 1 if tower is not null we don't add new towers, we simply replace them with another colorTower.

    Method to compute a player's influence on an island given by the only students it is invoked if the NoColorInfluence character card was activated.

    void
    merge(Island toMerge)
    Method to merge two near islands with the same ColorTower, we sum the attributes of the two islands the two islands to merge can be both a single island or a group of islands, since we just sum the attributes every time a merge takes place we recalculate the other islands' indexes in the Game class.

      public void setNoEntryTiles(int num)
      Parameters:
      num - so it is possible both to add or to remove an EntryTile (num will respectively be +1 or -1)

    • getNoEntryTiles

      public int getNoEntryTiles()

    • changeTower

      public void changeTower(ColorTower tower)
      Method to change the tower(s) on the island(s), if tower is null it means that there were no towers at all on the island and so we set numTowers to 1 if tower is not null we don't add new towers, we simply replace them with another colorTower.
      Parameters:
      tower - is the new colorTower to build on the island(s).

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(PawnColor toAdd)
      Method to add a student to the island.
      Parameters:
      toAdd - is the color of the student to add.

    • computeTotalInfluence

      public int computeTotalInfluence(Player player)
      Method to compute a player's influence on an island. The method is divided in two sub-methods in order to differentiate the influence calculated by the towers and the students
      Parameters:
      player - indicates which player's influence we are computing.
      Returns:
      the value of the player's influence on this island.

    • computeTowerInfluence

      public int computeTowerInfluence(Player player)

    • computeStudentsInfluence

      public int computeStudentsInfluence(Player player)

    • computeNoColorInfluence

      public int computeNoColorInfluence(Player player, PawnColor noColorInfluence)
      Method to compute a player's influence on an island given by the only students it is invoked if the NoColorInfluence character card was activated.
      Parameters:
      player - indicates which player's influence we are computing.
      noColorInfluence - is the color chosen whose students don't count in this round.
      Returns:
      the value of the player's influence on this island.

    • merge

      public void merge(Island toMerge)
      Method to merge two near islands with the same ColorTower, we sum the attributes of the two islands the two islands to merge can be both a single island or a group of islands, since we just sum the attributes every time a merge takes place we recalculate the other islands' indexes in the Game class.
      Parameters:
      toMerge - is the island to merge with the current one.
